portfolio.title: PantryPal
portfolio.description: Web-App that tracks pantry items via manual input or image recognition. Generates recipe recommendations based on available ingredients and user preferences. Awarded the Apollo award, second highest level of achievement.

portfolio.title: 2nd Prize - National AI Challenge
portfolio.description: We built an end-to-end ML pipeline for predictive maintenance using Halliburtonâ€™s dataset, followed by an analytical report. The report was integrated into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline and deployed as a GenAI chatbot on DataRobot, enabling users to query our findings via natural language.

portfolio.title: MovieRec
portfolio.description: Conducted a comparative analysis of various contextual bandit algorithms to identify the most effective strategy on the movie dataset. Evaluated the algorithms using offline evaluation and bootstrapping to artificially increase sample size.

portfolio.title: Beijing Market
portfolio.description: Generated data visualisations to conclude if one should enter the Beijing Property Market. Created complex geospatial visualizations (choropleth maps) and demand-supply heatmaps to uncover market trends and regional disparities.

portfolio.title: MatchUp
portfolio.description: MatchUp connects players to organize and join group sports activities like football, basketball, or badminton. Users can set preferences for skill level, location, and availability, making it easy to find the right teammates and build community through sports.

description.point: Researched SOTA document parsing and evaluation techniques in NLP and layout analysis.
Built and deployed an end-to-end evaluation pipeline with advanced performance metrics.
Completed deep-skilling in NLP, PyTorch, and LLMs; developed a RAG-based chatbot using Haystack and Hugging Face.
Taught weekly 3 hour tutorials on Python programming to a class of 20 students.
Graded and gave feedback on their work.
Maintained a positive learning environment and close relationships with my students.
HCInteract Club Comms IC for a student-led project on mental wellness.
